TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the abstract class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在 Visual Web 設計工具中，當使用者從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，描述控制項的標記來源程式碼衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項將保存到標記來源的程式碼中，並編輯網頁的標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別可做為基底類別衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援，在 Visual Web 設計工具的設計工具<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別屬性會提供下列功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>繼承樹狀結構的設計工具中的每個層級的物件。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>並<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可存取衍生自控制項的對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>會指出記憶體提供文字分別值清單項目內容的資料來源的欄位。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別方法提供下列功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法繫結相關聯的控制項是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計階段資料來源。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法會傳回用來在設計階段呈現關聯的控制項的標記。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>元件從關聯的控制項容器。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>從控制項容器，解析為設計時間<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>控制項的屬性。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備設計工具，以檢視和設計關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>關聯的控制項已變更。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法來移除其他屬性，加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項衍生自屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。 第一個範例示範如何衍生自訂的控制項設計工具。 第二個示範如何將衍生的控制項使用設計工具產生關聯。
下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為類別`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法。 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別顯示`SimpleRadioButtonList`設計介面上的控制項。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#1)]
下列程式碼範例衍生`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項，並示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>類別來建立關聯`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項，其設計工具，使用`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別建立關聯的控制項是衍生自時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計介面上的類別。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

Docs.param: The associated control derived from the , or a copy of that control.
Docs.summary: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 針對<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>物件的參考設計階段資料來源，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，，然後再還原<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>為其原始值的屬性。
針對<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會有任何功能，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>物件只是已加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。

member this.DataMember : string with get, set
public: property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>屬性會設定或擷取要用於設計階段表示控制項在執行階段的標記。 這會提供透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>關聯的控制項，對應於提供清單項目的文字內容的資料來源欄位的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataValueField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataValueField : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>相關聯的控制項，表示提供值的清單項目內容的資料來源的欄位屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

Docs.summary: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
Docs.returns: A containing the markup used to render the control derived from the at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件是資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法可清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，並將<xref:System.String>訊息，表示控制項資料繫結。 如果關聯的控制項不是資料繫結與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合是空的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>新增<xref:System.String>訊息，表示未繫結控制項。 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>呼叫其基底方法，以產生標記。
## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，以自訂相關聯的控制項在設計介面上顯示的標記。 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>未定義屬性關聯的控制項，它會設定為`Gainsboro`，和控制項都會顯示該背景色彩。 這麼做，基底實作之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>呼叫方法。
此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetResolvedSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
Docs.returns: An containing the design-time , resolved to the of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>具有相同名稱不存在。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>無法解析成<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>相關聯的控制項，屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>會傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
Docs.returns: An object implementing an interface and containing the design-time of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>具有相同名稱不存在。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.param: A control derived from the that implements an .
Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法和其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至 設計工具的運作所需的事件。
`component`參數是衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>，，與這個設計工具相關聯，或該控制項的複本。
## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>設計工具中的方法衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，以確保只有在控制項類別的執行個體名為`SimpleRadioButtonList`所使用的自訂設計工具。
此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object source, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object source, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (source As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ source, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>至目前的資料來源的物件，如果控制項已連接資料來源不同，更新設計階段標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法後連接到目前的資料來源的更新設計階段標記。
## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法中的類別，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 當資料來源也就是與變更相關聯設計工具類別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法呼叫，而且此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`至`true`。
此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)

Docs.param: A that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated. This parameter is ignored.
Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別目前的資料來源，如果控制項已連接資料來源不同，更新設計階段標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>後連接到目前的資料來源設計工具的方法無條件地將更新過的設計階段標記。 值`forceUpdateView`會被忽略。
## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法中的類別，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 當資料來源也就是與變更相關聯設計工具類別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>呼叫，此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`到`true`。
此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

block.para: 呼叫端應該使用公用覆寫。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
Docs.summary: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。
控制項是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>關聯控制項的屬性。

block.para: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>屬性會傳回`false`，讓資料來源下拉式清單中不會顯示與**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**操作功能表。 相反地，此功能表項目會顯示**選擇資料來源** 對話方塊中，可讓使用者選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>並<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>屬性。

block.para: 覆寫屬性來傳回如果您想要衍生自控制項類別，以顯示資料來源下拉式清單中使用 * * 選擇資料來源 功能表中的項目 * * 在設計階段常見工作 操作功能表。
